thread.title: Dodgers, Mattingly part ways: 'We all felt this was the right time,' manager says
thread.title_full: Dodgers, Mattingly part ways: 'We all felt this was the right time,' manager says

author: BILL PLUNKETT
title: Dodgers, Mattingly part ways: 'We all felt this was the right time,' manager says
text: Dodgers, Mattingly part ways: 'We all felt this was the right time,' manager says Oct. 22, 2015 Updated 6:22 p.m. 1 of 1 Don Mattingly took the Dodgers to three consecutive playoff berths, but in discussions with president of baseball operations Andrew Friedman and GM Farhan Zaidi, they all agreed it was time for the manager to go. ROD VEAL, ORANGE COUNTY REGISTER Don Mattingly took the Dodgers to three consecutive playoff berths, but in discussions with president of baseball operations Andrew Friedman and GM Farhan Zaidi, they all agreed it was time for the manager to go. ROD VEAL, ORANGE COUNTY REGISTER
